verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye the <S%H3050>LORD<s%>: for it is <S%H2896>good<s%> to sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto our <S%H430>God<s%>; for it is <S%H5273>pleasant<s%>; and <S%H8416>praise<s%> is <S%H5000>comely<s%>.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> doth build <S%H1129>up<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: he gathereth <S%H3664>together<s%> the <S%H1760>outcasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
He <S%H7495>healeth<s%> the <S%H7665>broken<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and bindeth <S%H2280>up<s%> their <S%H6094>wounds<s%>. wounds: Heb. griefs
He <S%H4487>telleth<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3556>stars<s%>; he <S%H7121>calleth<s%> them all by their <S%H8034>names<s%>.
<S%H1419>Great<s%> is our <S%H113>Lord<s%>, and of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%>: his <S%H8394>understanding<s%> is <S%H4557>infinite<s%>. his: Heb. of his understanding there is no number
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> lifteth <S%H5749>up<s%> the <S%H6035>meek<s%>: he <S%H8213>casteth<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H8213>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>.
<S%H6030>Sing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>; sing <S%H2167>praise<s%> upon the <S%H3658>harp<s%> unto our <S%H430>God<s%>:

Who <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> with <S%H5645>clouds<s%>, who <S%H3559>prepareth<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> for the <S%H776>earth<s%>, who maketh <S%H2682>grass<s%> to <S%H6779>grow<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>.
He <S%H5414>giveth<s%> to the <S%H929>beast<s%> his <S%H3899>food<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6158>ravens<s%> which <S%H7121>cry<s%>.
He <S%H2654>delighteth<s%> not in the <S%H1369>strength<s%> of the <S%H5483>horse<s%>: he taketh not <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H7785>legs<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%>.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> taketh <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him, in those that <S%H3176>hope<s%> in his <S%H2617>mercy<s%>.
<S%H7623>Praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; <S%H1984>praise<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, O <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
For he hath <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>; he hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thy <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> thee.

He <S%H7760>maketh<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> in thy <S%H1366>borders<s%>, and <S%H7646>filleth<s%> thee with the <S%H2459>finest<s%> of the <S%H2406>wheat<s%>. He: Heb. Who maketh thy border peace finest: Heb. fat of wheat
He sendeth <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H565>commandment<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%>: his <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7323>runneth<s%> very <S%H4120>swiftly<s%>.
He <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H7950>snow<s%> like <S%H6785>wool<s%>: he <S%H6340>scattereth<s%> the <S%H3713>hoarfrost<s%> like <S%H665>ashes<s%>.
He casteth <S%H7993>forth<s%> his <S%H7140>ice<s%> like <S%H6595>morsels<s%>: who can <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H7135>cold<s%>?
He sendeth <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>, and <S%H4529>melteth<s%> them: he causeth his <S%H7307>wind<s%> to <S%H5380>blow<s%>, and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5140>flow<s%>.
He <S%H5046>sheweth<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H1697><s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, his <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4941>judgments<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. his word: Heb. his words
He hath not <S%H6213>dealt<s%> so with any <S%H1471>nation<s%>: and as for his <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, they have not <S%H3045>known<s%> them. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye the <S%H3050>LORD<s%>.
